short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your shopping experience on Kakobuy and CNFans with this helpful extension!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:
✨ View QC (Quality Check) photos directly on product pages
📸 Convenient lightbox viewer for QC photos with easy navigation
🚫 Removes annoying "warm reminder" popups on CNfans
✅ Automatically enables the "Check Agree" checkbox on CNfans
🖼️ Clean and intuitive interface
👀 And more coming soon...

Simple to use - just install and browse products normally. QC photos will appear automatically on supported product pages!
